channel.title: Need a guide for no-ip!
channel.description: i need a very detailed no-ip guide. i mean super detailed..i only know how to put a port on a router..but then im stumped afterwards..im using hamachi at the moment and its being gay

item.title: Need a guide for no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

i have windows duc, i put in the name and stuff…does this mean its up?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 04, 2007, 07:40:34 PM[/size][hr]it says the host is invalid…what one do i select?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a guide for no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

for the ip address make sure its the ip of ur computer, to find out what it is go to this site, whatsmyip.org
and whatever it is make sure its the ip at the top of the page
and for the hostname it can be wutever u want, for the mail options, leave it blank
click create host, then at the top of the page click downloads, and download the one for ur computer type(example: windows, linux, mac)

Read full topic

item.title: Need a guide for no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

doesn’t matter, if you did ur router thing, then all u have to do is make an ip on no-ip.com, then on no-ip go to the downloads section, and download the one for ur computer system, then try logging on with the ip u made, and it should work

Read full topic

NOT TO MENTION BUT IF THIS HELPS I HAVE A LINKSYSY ROUTER

item.title: Need a guide for no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

lets say ur router says 5555, then open server.java, change the 43594 to 5555, ect. they both have to be the same, what the no-ip does is it redirects your ip to the ip u made there, so if u made blahblahblah.no-ip.org, and you type that in on address bar, itll go to your router, same with logging in with mopar, when u type blahblahblah.no-ip.org on mopar, itll redirect to ur ip and log in

Read full topic

item.title: Need a guide for no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

do i add the port to the server e.g. testscape?
like the etsscape server is 43594…would i add that to my router and then run that server? then do the no-ip shit?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a guide for no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

well for now, wen u put hte port on the router, make sure its the same port on ur server, if not, open server.java look for ur port, change it to what ur routers is, and save n compile, create a no-ip account on no-ip.com, click add on the left, make the name wut u want, and the no-ip.org, or wutever u want, add it, and people can log in with the name u created, example blahblahblah.no-ip.org

Read full topic
